name: Octo and the Pocket Dimensions
description:
Octo is stranded in a liminal space between states of being, and he needs your help to get home! Connect pocket dimension tiles together to solve platforming puzzles!

CONTROLS

Arrow keys: Move left and right

Up: Jump

Down: Interact

F: Fullscreen

Esc: End game

MUSIC: Blue Lantern by Yi Nantiro
